content.raw:
Oh, I might have misunderstood what was meant by "versioning include paths" in my earlier reply. I thought it meant the fact that we put our include path inside of a versioned directory. If it instead means that we have to specify `#include <ignition/math3/SomeHeader.hh>` in header files, then the first line of my earlier reply is not accurate.

But yes, I think you've made an accurate breakdown here.
